name: tensorflow_objectdetection_1.14-predict
description: Making predictions using object detection models built with Object Detection API using Tensorflow 1.14

inputs.name: model
inputs.help: The Tensorflow object detection model to use for making predictions.

inputs.name: data
inputs.help: The dataset to generate predictions for.

parameters.name: clear-dataset
parameters.help: If enabled, any meta-data or predictions get removed from the dataset beforehand.

parameters.name: min-score
parameters.help: The minimum score (0-1) that the predictions need to achieve for being included.

parameters.name: mask-threshold
parameters.help: The threshold (0-1) to use for determining the contour of a mask.

parameters.name: top-x
parameters.help: The top X predictions to output.

parameters.name: store-predictions
parameters.help: If enabled, the predictions get stored back in the dataset that they were generated for.

parameters.name: generate-polygons
parameters.help: If enabled, polygons are traced around the detected objects.

parameters.name: generate-mask-images
parameters.help: If enabled, PNGs with an indexed palette are generated depicting the detected objects.

parameters.name: confidence-scores
parameters.help: The semicolon-separated list of classes for calculating confidence scores, which get stored back in the meta-data of the image.
